pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhaṇḍanakārikā hoti kalahakārikā vivādakārikā bhassakārikā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.3: Thullanandā bhikkhunī tassā kamme karīyamāne paṭikkosati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmakaṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.6: “thullanandā bhikkhunī pakkantā”ti, caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.7: Thullanandā bhikkhunī gāmake taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā punadeva sāvatthiṃ paccāgacchi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.8: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āgacchantiyā neva āsanaṃ paññapesi na pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakaṭhalikaṃ upanikkhipi na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi na pānīyena āpucchi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.10: “kissa tvaṃ, ayye, mayi āgacchantiyā neva āsanaṃ paññapesi na pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakaṭhalikaṃ upanikkhipi na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi na pānīyena āpucchī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.14: ‘ayaṃ anāthā appaññātā, natthi imissā kāci paṭivattā’ti, āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṃsū”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.16: “bālā etā abyattā etā, neva jānanti kammaṃ vā kammadosaṃ vā kammavipattiṃ vā kammasampattiṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.17: Mayaṃ kho jānāma kammampi kammadosampi kammavipattimpi kammasampattimpi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.18: Mayaṃ kho akataṃ vā kammaṃ kāreyyāma kataṃ vā kammaṃ kopeyyāmā”ti, lahuṃ lahuṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ sannipātetvā caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ osāresi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.19: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.20: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāressatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.21: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāretī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.24: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāressati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.26: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:1.27: “Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāreyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:2.1.10: āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā ukkhittā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:2.1.19: “Osāressāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss4:2.1.20: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā, kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
